text: Is there a way to "reset" coverage information inside a running Julia instance? Say I have a Julia version running, I ran some code and got coverage information. Now I want to dismiss existing coverage information and collect new one, without restarting the Julia process.

elements.text: Is there a way to "reset" coverage information inside a running Julia instance? Say I have a Julia version running, I ran some code and got coverage information. Now I want to dismiss existing coverage information and collect new one, without restarting the Julia process.

text: Oh, that deletes coverage information? I thought it only cleared profile information?
